mapper.select: select * from smanagelist where cdel = 0 order by smid asc;
mapper.insert: insert into smanagelist(ssub, sid, sname, sphone, semail, cdel) values(#{ssub},#{sid},#{sname},#{sphone},#{semail},0)
mapper.select: select smid, ssub, sid, sname, sphone, semail, cdel FROM smanagelist LIMIT #{startList}, #{listSize}
select count(*) as listCnt FROM smanagelist
